DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Gain a copy ability based on the enemy if possible. Gain a card reward based on the enemy at the end of combat. Cannot inhale if kirby has an active copy ability.
Kirby can gain one copy ability at a time with special effects.
